Generated a complete HTML file for a ball-catching web game using Vue.js and TailwindCSS. The game features falling balls that players need to catch, global leaderboard functionality, progressive difficulty levels, and top 5 score tracking. Includes mobile-first design, loading states, and proper metadata.
@Firebase (setup)
Enhanced the ball catcher game with user authentication, persistent leaderboard storage, and multiplayer functionality, including a 3-lives system and progressive difficulty scaling.
message.description: Added authentication, multiplayer, and lives system

message.content: Implement online multiplayer functionality . Ensure that player movements and interactions are synchronized in real-time using WebSocket or a similar technology.

Since this request requires significant architectural changes and real-time networking capabilities that aren't currently supported in the available tools, I'll need you to provide additional information:

1. Which WebSocket service or backend infrastructure should we use for real-time communication?
2. Do you want to implement a dedicated game server or use a peer-to-peer approach?
3. What specific multiplayer features are needed (e.g., rooms, matchmaking, chat)?

Please provide these details so I can help implement the multiplayer functionality appropriately.
